shortdesc.p: We are going on a cruise to the Bahamas.

topic.title: How to create an account on Carnival.com

shortdesc.p: These steps will guide you in registering for the correct cruise on the Carnival.com website.
On the Carnival homepage, you will enter cruise specifics to find the correct cruise to sign up for this spring break.

topic.title: How to sign up for an excursion

shortdesc.p: We will be participating in the "Sail and Snorkel" excursion in Nassau, Bahamas. Follow the steps to sign up for the excursion.

topic.title: How to travel to the port

shortdesc.p: Here are the steps to traveling to the port in Orlando, Florida to board the cruise. You will drive to the port from Virginia Tech, which is a 10.5 hour drive.
